content:
I'm planning to start with some light stretching exercises, maybe some yoga poses or some simple neck and shoulder rolls. I've also been interested in trying some guided meditation apps, like Headspace or Calm, to help me get started. I've heard great things about them, and I think they could be really helpful in reducing my stress and anxiety.

Also, I was thinking of setting aside some time in the morning to plan out my day, maybe make a to-do list or set some goals for myself. I've found that having a clear plan in mind helps me feel more focused and motivated throughout the day.

Do you have any recommendations for guided meditation apps or resources? I'd love to hear about your experiences with them!
